about_the_game:
This version contains two additional features:
1) Cheats — you may control changeable parameters of character and girls with legal tool. It helps to open all pathes and scenes.
2) Events — when you play MEFF you would have your favourite scenes. This feature helps you to repeat all sex events from the game per one click.
3) Walkthrough (in game folder)


Our new game is already in development! More girls, more sex, more animations and beautiful locations. Hurry up and add it to your Wishlist and follow our new game! [/b]

content_descriptors.notes:
The game graphically depicts sex. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.

All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

short_description: My Ex-Future Family is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of human life. The game is packed with humor, sex, romance and plot turnings. Play as a young man who seduces girls who surround him, complete tasks of the Principal and build your life in house of your family!
